Units

MB3 Recon Drones


Combat drone unit with scouting capabilities.

The Recon Drone mounts an array of support systems to aid Pathfinder Teams in the field.

Attributes

groupSizeMax: 3, armor: 6, hitpointsMax: 2.0, moraleMax: 6, movementMax: 3, cargoSlots: 0, itemSlots: 0,

Weapons

Burst Cannon x 1,

Traits

Drone Controller In Range, Jet Pack, Relentless, Supporting Fire, Extra Infantry Armour,

Actions

Scout,

Cost

Upkeep
